title: Is wudu valid if only few drops of water enter nose while making wudu? (istinshaq) - Assim al hakeem
transcript: and he gets always his doubts like when he makes instant shock only few water comes in his nose and only few drops of water come out from his nose so it's just this very few water enough for inside shock as long as it's in shock which is pulling the water in wudhu up your nostrils as long as you get some water in this does the job of course the sunnah is to inhale as much as possible and to without harming yourself and taking that out so that you would cleanse your nose but as long as you've got some water inside this does the job
